item.title: Accelerating industry-wide innovations in datacenter infrastructure and security
item.description: Microsoft drives innovation and contributes to the broader AI and datacenter community, benefitting the entire industry. The post Accelerating industry-wide innovations in datacenter infrastructure and security appeared first on Microsoft Azure Blog. Link to article: https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/accelerating-industry-wide-innovations-in-datacenter-infrastructure-and-security/
